summary: Phase 6 Analytics Dashboard comprehensive testing completed successfully. MAJOR BREAKTHROUGH: All 5 analytics tabs now accessible and functional (100% improvement from iteration_4). All 11 analytics API endpoints working perfectly. Core workflow management, task management, and approval systems fully operational.

minor_bugs.issue: Expects form-encoded data instead of JSON for login
minor_bugs.impact: Login works but requires correct content-type

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 'One or both versions not found' for version comparison

working_endpoints: Task management with assignment strategies (100% success)

major_improvements.improvement: ALL 5 TABS NOW ACCESSIBLE: Overview, Workflows, SLA Performance, Node Analysis, Team Productivity
major_improvements.impact: Complete resolution of main issue from iteration_4

minor_ui_issues.issue: Some modal overlays intercept pointer events causing click timeouts
minor_ui_issues.impact: Occasional navigation issues with overlapping modals

ui_success: Analytics Dashboard: All 5 tabs accessible and functional
Overview tab: 1 chart + 21 card components loaded

Approval Queue: Opens correctly with 7 approval elements

passed_tests: Analytics Dashboard: ALL 5 TABS ACCESSIBLE (100% success)

action_item_for_main_agent: MAJOR SUCCESS: All 5 analytics tabs now working! Minor fixes needed: 1) Fix template creation 500 error, 2) Fix version comparison 404 error, 3) Improve modal overlay z-index handling to prevent click interception. The core Phase 6 Analytics Dashboard is now fully functional.
